changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE USER_OTP ( ID NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, OTP_VALUE VARCHAR2(255) NOT NULL, OTP_TYPE VARCHAR2(255) NOT NULL, USER_NAME VARCHAR2(255) NOT NULL, IS_DAMAGED NUMBER(1) default 0, IS_EXPIRED NUMBER(1) default 0, IS_CONSUMED NUMBER(1) default 0, USER_ID NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, EXPIRATION_DATE DATE, CREATED_BY VARCHAR2(255), CREATED_DATE DATE, CREATED_BY_ID NUMBER(10), LAST_MODIFIED_BY_ID NUMBER(10), LAST_MODIFIED_DATE DATE, LAST_MODIFIED_BY VARCHAR2(255), PRIMARY KEY (ID), FOREIGN KEY (USER_ID) REFERENCES APP_USER (ID) );
CREATE SEQUENCE USER_OTP_SEQ MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 999999999 INCREMENT BY 1 START WITH 1 NOCACHE NOCYCLE;
